content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we place great value in employee satisfaction and provide our employees with the best possible conditions to work productively and in a comfortable atmosphere. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We offer a wide range of perks and benefits designed to help you feel well. The well-being of our employees makes our success possible! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All benefits set out below are subject to certain eligibility conditions, the terms of any EPAM policies in force from time to time, your employment contract and the terms of the relevant insurance policies in place from time to time. Unless otherwise stated, all benefits set out below are non-contractual and EPAM reserves the right to vary, replace or discontinue any benefits provided or change the provider or the terms on which they are provided from time to time.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some of the benefits we offer: \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Private Healthcare Insurance :\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All employees are offered healthcare insurance as a complement to the public healthcare system which gives you access to planned care under private management. Including: \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tCare by a private physician, operations and hospital care \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tMedicines and patient copayments in the public healthcare system \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tAftercare – post-operative rehabilitation \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tPhysiotherapist, naprapath, chiropractor \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tPsychologist/psychotherapist \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tDietician \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tTravel and lodging (in connection with treatment) \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tMedical devices for help in healing \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tSecond opinion \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•\\tPost-operative domestic services \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Occupational Pension :\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will be eligible to participate in the Company’s pension plan. The Company has engaged a third-party - Max Matthiessen (or Söderberg & Partners depending on employment), to provide employees an opportunity to personally design individual occupational pension plans. From the age of 25, all permanent employees will receive a pension with a guaranteed repayment and family pension of SEK 10.000 monthly for 10 years. The administration of the pension will be in traditional insurance. The contribution is based on age and salary (% of salary). More information will be shared in your first meeting with our partner.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Wellness Grant\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" :\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will receive a Wellness Grant (Friskvårdsbidrag) as a tax-exempt refund of SEK 2 000 for expenses regarding Exercise and Health Care, which aim to create well-being at work and help promote a healthier lifestyle. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Flexible schedule :\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We want you to be able to harmonize your job with your family and personal life. At EPAM we have recommended office hours are 8 AM – 5 PM from Monday through Friday (eight-hour workday and a one-hour lunch). Depending on your responsibilities work hours and location \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Depending on your activity, with us you can also enjoy the freedom of working from a home office. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amazing corporate events :\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can take advantage of the opportunity to visit memorable corporate such as Winter Party, Summer party, Software Engineering Conference and other professional conferences, workshops, meetups, townhalls and talks and many other bright and exciting events. Some of the events are available for you before even now! \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Language courses & Education :\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM helps its employees reach their full potential and achieve their professional goals through learning. EPAM also offers a wide range of internal and external courses, webinars, online programs, self-placed studies that can help you develop your professional expertise. The company provides free English and German courses as well as interesting Events in foreign languages. But there is more to it! All employees have unlimited access to over 8,000 online courses and learning paths on LinkedIn Learning (formerly lynda.com). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Branded gifts :\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"From the first day and throughout your time at EPAM you will be given branded gifts for important company anniversaries and events. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
